input.sentences: even the roofing tiles are so pretty .
some safety steps to climb into the sewers on .
a fire hydrant . so similar to ours !
another really neat tapestry hanging up in our hotel .
output.sentences: It was a neat tapestry in the town center.
The roofing and tiles in the neighborhood were pretty on the tour.
The sewer's safety steps were painted a bright yellow.
The fire hydrant in the common area of town were similar to the new age ones installed in the sidewalk.
The hotel's tapestry was just as cool as the one I saw touring town.
